docs.text:
Google Play App Store [CMS]


To check our demo site please visit: 
http://googelplayappstore.info


About Our Product




Google Play Store CMS
 is an android market site specifically for Google Play Store. You can add apps / games / themes etc in this CMS based on your needs.


You can get details such as title, images, screenshots etc of a specific apps / games using our admin page.




Features




Allow to add your own app / games / themes and can automate to get details if the app was published in google play store.


Allow Developer / Users to submit apps.


Review Submitted apps / games.


Add or Upload apk file.


Add featured apps.


Responsive Design.


Google Analytics Ready.


Report Spam Contents.


Contact us page.


Unlimited Add Pages.


Advertisements Ready


And many more . . .




Technology Used




Built using Laravel 5.2 Framework


Coffeescript


AngularJS


Gulp


Bootstrap 4




Server Requirements




PHP 
= 5.5.9


OpenSSL PHP Extension


PDO PHP Extension


Mbstring PHP Extension


Tokenizer PHP Extension




Changelog


1.6 Version Release




Fixed problem with category listing..


Fixed Sitemap Problem (Not creating multiple sitemap index)


Fixed Search problem when “enter” button was click.


Fixed Google play Bar Number length




1.5.1 Version Release




Quick Fixed Google Api.




1.5 Version Release




Quick Fixed for Google Play Store Scraper new codes.


Support PHP 7.2


Other minor fixed.


Preparing api for MOBILE APP (plugins)




1.4 Version Release




Fixed Mobile Preview Firefox 


Fixed meta description duplicate 


Fixed problem for User Profile in the backend. 


10 sec waiting page before the download starts 


Additional informations   


Required Android


Installs


Published/Updated Date






App Ratings


App Ratings Total


Added Custom Inputs, you can add any custom inputs you want. 




1.3 Version Release




Fixed Seo Title on detail page


Add Rich Snippets for Google Search


Fixed RSS title and description problem


Fixed problem in some app that cannot be scrape 


Fixed Https cover image 


Fixed image not loading in firefox


Auto Download Apk




1.2 Version Release




Translation Manager 


Fixed problem for custom link download 


Allow user activation via email can be turn on/off in settings page 


Forgot/Reset password with e-mail link 


Replaced Small Screenshots to Full Screenshots Images


Added Ratings Total


Added Published Date


Added Custom CSS/JS configuration


Related apps in detail page


Add the star rating images in frontend


If no download available, redirect to google play store


Fixed tag author title from link


Fixed app detail category link


Fixed RSS and validate using https://validator.w3.org/feed


Added google reCAPTCHA for login and registration




1.1 Version Release




Auto Search Function


Social Share Problem


Upload Logo




Additional Informations




Reviews


Histogram


Ratings Score


Required Android


No. of installs








Category Icons (using fontawesome)




Download Link Redirection Timer


User Management




Social Logins




Facebook


Twitter


Google+








Fixed Submit apps frontend




RTL Support


Sitemap


RSS Feeds


User Management




1.0 - Initial Release

docs.text:
Google Play App Store [CMS]


This page will guide you in the installation of our script. Please check all the requirements and purchase the script on codecanyon only.


Configuration and Uploading Files






Please check your server requirements again.


Server Requirements




PHP 
= 5.5.9


OpenSSL PHP Extension


PDO PHP Extension


Mbstring PHP Extension


Tokenizer PHP Extension








Unzip GooglePlayAppStore[CMS] Script after downloading it from 
codecanyon
.


After unzipping our script you will find, documentation folders and GooglePlayStoreApp[CMS] folder. Open up GooglePlayStoreApp[CMS] folder and edit .local.env file for your configuration. Please see the image below.




Once you open up 
.local.env
 file, with your favorite text editor. please make sure to edit the lines of codes that was highlighted in the image, to used fully the funcitonality of the script.



This are the basic thing that you need to edit.


Website Link




APP_URL




*
Database Configurations




DB_DATABASE


DB_USERNAME


DB_PASSWORD




Mail Settings




MAIL_DRIVER


MAIL_HOST


MAIL_PORT


MAIL_USERNAME


MAIL_PASSWORD


MAIL_ENCRYPTION








Importing SQL Database




After editing .local.env file, go to your phpmyadmin if you have one, and import this sql that will create the necessary table for your new script.


You will find this folder after unzipping the script. the folder name: 
SQL/googleplayappsdb.sql
. 




Please check the image below.








Storage Folder




Make sure storage folder is writtable so you will not have problem in the installation of our script.




If you have access to your ssh server, then do this. 




Login in your server ssh terminal and go to your google play app store script.


In your terminal, run this code..
        
chmod -R 777 storage


It will run recursively and make all the folder inside becomes writable.








If you cant access your terminal command you can used your filezilla ftp or cpanel to change the permission of the storage folder.








Social Login


Facebook




Create Facebook App


First, visit this link, 
Developers Facebook
,


After login, click the create app button and a new modal will popup.



Fill up all the details, and click Create App ID. After that you will be redirected to the main dashboard. See image below.


Note your App ID and App Secret.



Then go to, Settings,  and fill up App Domains and create new platform for your website.



After clicking the + Add Platform choose the Website.





Once your done, hit the button "Save Changes".







Get your App ID and App Secret and paste it in our 
config/oauth-5-laravel.php








Google+




Visit this link, 
console developers google
, then login your gmail account or create new one.


Click the create new app, and then fill up the details and click the create button.



Go to library menu in the sidebar, and click Google+ API, see the image below.



Then click the enable button.



Click credentials menu in the sidebar and select the tab, OAuth Consent Screen and put your Product Name.



Then, in the first tab Credentials, select the OuAth Client ID. see the image below.



Fill up all the necessary details for your callback.. please see the instruction inside the image..





Once you're done you can get already your client id and client secret.






Get your client id and client secret and paste it in our 
config/oauth-5-laravel.php








Twitter




First thing to do, visit 
twitter app
 for developers create twitter account or login your existing account.


Once you login, click the create new app button. and you will be redirected to the creation page.. see image below.



Fill up all the necessary details, the click the Create your Twitter Application button.


Get your Consumer Key and Consumer Secret





ReCaptcha Code




First visit Google reCaptcha site 
https://www.google.com/recaptcha/intro/android.html
 click "Get Recaptcha" button at the top right.




It will redirect you to login using your gmail account, after logging in, you can start generating your site key and secret key.







After clicking the register button, it will redirect you to the next page with the generated site and secret key, copy that and save it in the admin general settings page.







Final Step




After editing all the necessary files, you can start browsing your new google play store app cms script.


Try to navigating it in your browser and everything will work nicely.




Have Problems?






If you experience problem installing our script please contact us using our profile in codecanyon.


at codecanyon -ianthonypillos

docs.text:
Google Play App Store [CMS]


This page will guide you on how you can update your existing code to new version.


1.6 Updates Instructions


(Note: you will only apply this update if you have 1.6 version installed already, if fresh installed disregard this instruction)




Open the 
Updates/1.6/
 folder and upload everything in your server.


And thats it.


Let me know if you encounter any problem.
docs.title: Update Instructions

docs.text: This page will guide you on how you can update your existing code to new version.
docs.title: Google Play App Store [CMS]

docs.text: (Note: you will only apply this update if you have 1.6 version installed already, if fresh installed disregard this instruction)   Open the  Updates/1.6/  folder and upload everything in your server.  And thats it.  Let me know if you encounter any problem.
docs.title: 1.6 Updates Instructions

docs.text:
Google Play App Store [CMS]


Screenshots of our frontend and backend page.


Frontend Page


Homepage


Lists all apps / games /themes



Category Details


Lists of all categories



App detail page


This page will show all app details information such as screenshots, download options for apk and comments sections and more.




Login Page


Login page for users/developers




Submit Your App Page


Users can submit their own app here and the admin will review it.



Report Content Spam and Abuse


Lists of all categories





Backend Page


Report Content Spam and Abuse


Admin Home Page Screen



Add/Remove Apps/ Games


Apps listing page



Update Apps Information Details


Update Apps Information



Featured Apps Selections


Select your featured apps that will show in editors pick page.



Add your advertisement details


Create unlimited ads code and place it in any page you want using the block code that you specify.
